channel.title: Abyssalscape V1.0 [317] LINK FIXED
channel.description:
Abyssalscape is an amazing 317 server with everything customly made and lots to do. New Locations and New Commands. With starting from scratch to build up to this awesome new 317 server. New train and New Skills area. And with the new staffzone and new starter kit and new spawning kit with full Arhims. Added fully working woodcutting with the emote and the log delay getting and sending to your inventory. And a colored commands list :) Large server walking area and a new place to host special events. Any suggestions please comment or message me. Here is all the picture and i hope its worth for you to download it. if the link is invalid please tell me and i will will update it.
Please stop calling me a noob, yes it is newbish but of course, this is my first server i have coded.
::Here is a all new woodcutting area all coded by me.:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/WoodcuttingArea.png[/img]
::All new homes area witch is edge but i have coded it in a new style:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/Home.png[/img]
::Newly coded vengeance:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/Veng.png[/img]
::Brand new training area with a new location and new monsters:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/TrainArea.png[/img]
::All new staffzone fully coded by me.:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/StaffZone.png[/img]
::Good old slayer area never fails anyone:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/SlayerTower.png[/img]
::The shops are in the home area.:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/Shops.png[/img]
::Pkbox from homiescape, Its the best.:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/PkBox.png[/img]
::All new skills area, Skills shops in the home area.:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/NewSkillsArea.png[/img]
::Old mage bank + pk spot:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/MageBank.png[/img]
::Members area? YES There is members on this server!:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/Membersbar.png[/img]
::Kalphite Queen Lair:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/KalphiteQueen.png[/img]
::Godsword Mini Game, The Best Mini-Game Ever :):: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/GSmini.png[/img]
::Awesome FightPits:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/FightPits.png[/img]
::Events Area for hosting server events:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/EventSpot.png[/img]
::CastleWars Pking:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/Cwars.png[/img]
::Good Old Barrows :):: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/Barrows.png[/img]
::This is a place i like to call AllOutPk After you teleport here there is no rules applying pking:: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/AllOutPk.png[/img]
::::::::::Commands:::::::::::: [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/AdminCommands.png[/img] [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/PlayCommands.png[/img] [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/OwnerCommands.png[/img] [IMG]http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv270/darler121212/ModCommands.png[/img] ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
To get to the woodcutting area use the command ::Woodcut To get to the Members Bar if your a member use the command ::Mbar To get to the mage bank use the command ::mbank
--Everything fully coded but a few things witch is... Pkbox-- Pkbox made by - Coder Brian --Thanks for looking at this newly coded server and i hope you like it. Download:http://uppit.com/93gc4644a7ts/AbyssalScape_Source.rar
Any suggestions please message me thanks :) -----------------------------------------------------------------------

@SkaterBoiX wrote:

Abyssalscape is an amazing 317 server with everything customly made and lots to do. New Locations and New Commands. With starting from scratch to build up to this awesome new 317 server. New train and New Skills area. And with the new staffzone and new starter kit and new spawning kit with full Arhims. Added fully working woodcutting with the emote and the log delay getting and sending to your inventory. And a colored commands list Large server walking area and a new place to host special events. Any suggestions please comment or message me. Here is all the picture and i hope its worth for you to download it. if the link is invalid please tell me and i will will update it.

Please stop calling me a noob, yes it is newbish but of course, this is my first server i have coded.

Home.png763×500
